S

score - package score
A package that implements the LL and MDL scores to be used in the structure learning of a classifier
score - Variable in class classifier.AbstractBayes
A Score to be used to calculate weights between nodes
score - Variable in class main.tests.TestClassifier
 
score - Variable in class metrics.AbstractMultipleCategoryScore
A list of scores with a weighted average in the end
score(int, int, DataModel) - Method in class score.AbstractScore
This method calls the abstract method calculateScore to actually calculate the score
score(int, int, DataModel) - Method in interface score.Score
A method that given a node index, the index of its father and a DataModel with countings returns a double with a score for that particular connection between the node and its parent.
Score - Interface in score
An interface that provides a method called score.
SensitivityPerClass - Class in metrics.perclass
This class extends AbstractAuxiliaryScores and implements the method doCalculateScore using the formula to calculate the number of Sensitivity on multi-class problems
SensitivityPerClass(int[][]) - Constructor for class metrics.perclass.SensitivityPerClass
Constructor for the SensitivityPerClass, receives a matrix of int (int[][] - confusion matrix) used to calculate the scores of individual classes
